name: Brian Wang
body:
### ABOUT ME
Hi, my name is Brian Wang. I am a CS Major at Georgia Institute of Technology. I love to sing in falsetto, dance awkwardly, and make funny faces--but I also love to create and innovate. I am a teacher, an Eagle Scout, and a programmer who is looking to broaden his skill-set. As an iOS game developer I have a huge range of skills ranging from class architecture and object oriented programming, to UI-design and marketing. Nice to meet you!

### LANGUAGES AND TECHNOLOGIES
Objective-C, SpriteBuilder, Cocos2D, Leadership, Java, Public Speaking, Product Marketing, UI design

### PROJECTS
[Fruit Smash (MGWU Summer 2014)](brianwang9100.github.io/Fruit-Smash)

Molecule Mash

Rhythm Slap

ShareABeatWithCoke (dropped)

### CONTACT INFO
Brian Wang
Email: brianwang9100@gmail.com

LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/in/brianwang9100

GitHub: www.github.com/brianwang9100
